info.title: Statbotics REST API
info.description: The REST API for Statbotics. Please be nice to our servers! If you are looking to do large-scale data science projects, use the CSV exports on the GitHub repo.

get.description: Returns a single Year object. Requires a four-digit year, e.g. `2019`.

schema.title: Response Read Year V3 Year  Year  Get

parameters.name: metric

schema.description: How to sort the returned values. Any column in the table is valid.
schema.title: Metric

parameters.description: How to sort the returned values. Any column in the table is valid.

parameters.name: ascending

schema.description: Whether to sort the returned values in ascending order. Default is ascending
schema.title: Ascending

parameters.description: Whether to sort the returned values in ascending order. Default is ascending

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of events to return. Default is 1000.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return. Default is 1000.

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Offset from the first result to return.
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Offset from the first result to return.

200.description: Returns a list of Years since 2002. Older data is not available.

schema.title: Response Read Years V3 Years Get

get.description: Returns a single Team object. Requires a team number (no prefix).

schema.title: Response Read Team V3 Team  Team  Get

get.description: Returns up to 1000 teams at a time. Specify limit and offset to page through results.

parameters.name: country

schema.description: Capitalized country name, e.g. `USA` or `Canada`.
schema.title: Country

parameters.description: Capitalized country name, e.g. `USA` or `Canada`.

parameters.name: state

schema.description: Capitalized two-letter state code, e.g. `NC`.
schema.title: State

parameters.description: Capitalized two-letter state code, e.g. `NC`.

parameters.name: district

schema.description: One of [`fma`, `fnc`, `fsc`, `fit`, `fin`, `fim`, `ne`, `chs`, `ont`, `pnw`, `pch`, `isr`]
schema.title: District

parameters.description: One of [`fma`, `fnc`, `fsc`, `fit`, `fin`, `fim`, `ne`, `chs`, `ont`, `pnw`, `pch`, `isr`]

parameters.name: active

schema.description: Whether the team has played in the last year.
schema.title: Active

parameters.description: Whether the team has played in the last year.

parameters.name: metric

schema.description: How to sort the returned values. Any column in the table is valid.
schema.title: Metric

parameters.description: How to sort the returned values. Any column in the table is valid.

parameters.name: ascending

schema.description: Whether to sort the returned values in ascending order. Default is ascending
schema.title: Ascending

parameters.description: Whether to sort the returned values in ascending order. Default is ascending

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of events to return. Default is 1000.
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return. Default is 1000.

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Offset from the first result to return.
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Offset from the first result to return.
